text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Tunisia's high planning committee for approval of the final draft of the 9th development plan 1997-2001 stressed the importance of sharing out roles between public and private sectors.
- Tunisia to take part in the Euro-Mediterranean meeting of craft industry scheduled on May 16-17 in Marseille.
- Southern region of Tatraouine is one of the regions most capable of developing Saharan Tourism.
